content: Ahhh? But me no want milk...
Nuuu: Kitty no want milk right now!
Pffft... milk boring, kitty not thirsty!
Oh? Milk... milk?
Purrr. Me want that milk...
Milk look good. Kitty like milk.
Milk for kitty? Yes, please give.
Ah... oh... kitty want that milk...
Give kitty milk, kitty really want!
Pleasssse... must drink the milk... give...
Milk looks so tasty... must have now...
Give bottle to kitty! Kitty really want milk!
GIVE MILK... PLEASE GIVE IT!
Need milk... need milk NOW!!!
Must have MILK! Give kitty bottle NOW, or kitty take bottle from you!
Neeeed... miiiilk... give kitty bottle, RIGHT NOW!
Ohhh... milk so good... yesss...
Mmm... mmmmmilk...
Yesss... milk so yum... mmmmm...
Purrr... milk feels so good in my belly...
Ewww... apple. Kitty no want!
Hmmmm? You trying to feed apple to kitty? Kitty no eat apple!
Nuuu... apple tastes boring. Kitty want fish and milk!
Kitty don't want apple! Kitty not hungry, belly full.
Apple looks tasty. Yum.
Mmmmm. Kitty could eat that apple...
Apple don't look bad. Look good for kitty.
Want kitty to eat apple? Kitty could eat apple!
Ahhh... apple look so good. Give to kitty, kitty want to nom!
Mmmmm! Put apple in kitty belly, put it nao!
Stop teasing kitty with apple! Put it in kitty maw already!
Kitty want apple already, kitty hungry! Give apple to kitty!
GIVE APPLE TO KITTY NOW!
Need apple... so hungry... GIVE APPLE AT ONCE!
Kitty want to eat NOW! Give apple or kitty takes it!
Want apple... so tasty... give give give now now now!
Ohhh... mmmmm... apple!
Purrr... apple... purrr...
Apple very good for kitty. Kitty can feel apple sliding in tummy!
Apple feel very good in kitty tummy. More apple please!
